extension.summary: Retrospect enables playback of re-runs/catch-ups of TV shows available online.
extension.description: Retrospect uses the official websites and freely available streams of different broadcasting companies (mainly Dutch, Belgian, British, Norwegian and Swedish) to make their re-run/catch-up episodes available on the Kodi platform.[CR][CR]More information can be found at https://rieter.net or the Retrospect wiki at https://github.com/retrospect-addon/plugin.video.retrospect/wiki/.

extension.news:
[B]Retrospect v5.2.0 - Changelog - 2020-03-18[/B]
In this version of Retrospect we fixed some minor bugs in channels and introduced two new major changes. The first one is related to the way we detect whether playback started: we now properly inherit from the Kodi classes instead of having our own code. Secondly, we finally got rid of our `pickle` data in the item's urls. This caused minor updates to items, such as images or dates, to make Kodi see the items as new, because the `pickle` in its url changed. We now store a reference to a pickled file in the Retrospect user data folder.
[B]Framework related[/B] * Fixed: Issue where empty subtitle files could be stored after download (Fixes #1338) * Removed: The url no longer contains the full pickle of an item. Instead, it only contains a reference to an item that is located on disk (Fixes #1261) * Changed: use child class of `xbmc.Player` to detect playback start and stop
[B]GUI/Settings/Language related[/B] -
[B]Channel related[/B] * Fixed: TV4 episodic items would breakt without "del" in title * Fixed: ViaFree.se streams no longer worked (Fixes #1329) * Fixed: Omroep Gelderland (Fixes #1331)
